outfits: Layered wind-resistant mittens over gloves to keep the feeling in your finger
Lined shoes designed for cold conditions

When down filling gets wet, it hangs on to moisture and weighs you down. OPT for synthetic fillers designed to repel sweat

If you run in the evening or before dawn, look for reflective detailing to help vehicles see you
Just push up the sleeves when you get toasty - it's more convenient than removing a whole layer and then having to hold it while you run
